= Introduction =

= Get the source =

You can get the entire sources at Google code page of the project.

Use this command to anonymously check out the latest project source code:

# Non-members may check out a read-only working copy anonymously over HTTP.
{{{
svn checkout http://openredalert.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ openredalert-read-only
}}}

= Compil =

Use GCC with 

SDL - library
SDL_mixer - library

= Run the game =

Copy the folder '/data/' from a compiled archive and copy it in the folder of the programme.
Copy the REDALERT.mix and MAIN.mix files from original archives of the game into the folder '/data/mix'

and run the programme.
